feed.title: Comments on Simple Yet Sophisticated Group Page Editing
feed.subtitle: I have been leading the design of a new Open Source collaboration tool called EditThisPagePHP, which started six months ago and now is in beta. (post continues with information on the tool.)

link.title: Comments on Simple Yet Sophisticated Group Page Editing
Simple Yet Sophisticated Group Page Editing

entry.title: alex commented on 'Simple Yet Sophisticated Group Page Editing'

link.title: I'm amused at the talk of prior art and 1999 visions, the very first web client (1990) had EditThisPage built...

entry.summary: I'm amused at the talk of prior art and 1999 visions, the very first web client (1990) had EditThisPage built...
entry.content: I'm amused at the talk of prior art and 1999 visions, the very first web client (1990) had EditThisPage built in - the browser was the editor. The same approach is still taken by browsers like Amaya.

entry.title: Danny commented on 'Simple Yet Sophisticated Group Page Editing'

link.title: I'm amused at the talk of prior art and 1999 visions, the very first web client (1990) had EditThisPage built...

entry.summary: I'm amused at the talk of prior art and 1999 visions, the very first web client (1990) had EditThisPage built...
entry.content:
I'm amused at the talk of prior art and 1999 visions, the very first web client (1990) had EditThisPage built in - the browser was the editor. The same approach is still taken by browsers like Amaya.

http://www.w3.org/People/Berners-Lee/WorldWideWeb.html
